ogTitle: a daughter’s mission: special tribute to american hero mike spann - smarther news
ogDescription: the daughter of the first american killed in combat in the war on terror joins smarther news to tell the true story of her father. alison spann shares incredible insight about mike spann: his work for the cia, the mysterious american he encountered in afghanistan before he died, and why his sacrifice is one we should never forget.
summary: The daughter of the first American killed in combat in the War on Terror joins SmartHER News to tell the true story of her father. Alison Spann shares incredible insight about Mike Spann: His work for the CIA, the mysterious American he encountered in Afghanistan before he died, and why his sacrifice is one we should never forget.
